quote: Obstacles can't stop you. Problems can't stop you. Most of all, other people can't stop you. Only you can stop you. – Jeffrey Gitomer
fact: In the United States, a pound of potato chips costs two hundred times more than a pound of potatoes.
joke: How do you fix a broken pizza? With tomato paste.
